Articles.Content:
I've always thought that Scaled Composites does some of the most interesting cockpit designs...

[img]http://www.nasa.gov/centers/langley/images/content/70663main_proteus_lg.jpg[/img]
[img]http://cdn-www.airliners.net/aviation-photos/photos/1/0/8/1650801.jpg[/img]
[img]http://cdn-www.airliners.net/aviation-photos/photos/2/8/4/1564482.jpg[/img]

Anyone feel up for taking a crack at a cockpit that looks like these?
